text: The 2015 Brazil bus accident occurred on 15 March 2015, when a tourist bus veered off a road and plunged approximately into a ravine near the city of Joinville in Santa Catarina state in Brazil.http://news.xinhuanet.com/english/2015-03/15/c_134068577.htm At least 51 people died and 7 were injured in the accident. ==References== Brazil Bus accident Category:Road incidents in Brazil Category:Santa Catarina (state)
title: 2015 Brazil bus accident
